title: Furni Dokan
technologies: ReactJs, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB, Firebase, Stripe,JWT, Tailwind CSS,Daisy Ui, React,Query, React Hook Form.

features.feature: Implemented Card Payment Method(stripe) and stored all data at MongoDB.
Developed an Admin portal to manage all Sellers, all buyers and reported items.
Developed a Buyer portal to manage their profile, orders, and make payments.
Developed a Seller portal to add a product, product availability, manage his product and buyer.
Admin Credentials will be found in the README.me file on the Client Site Github link.
